name: com.google.unity.anr
description:
Java plugin to access Android OS API functions:
• ApplicationExitInfo - Describes the information of an application process's death
• Strict Mode - helps you find accidental I/O operations on the main thread
• Memory - It also provides a method to retrieve Memory Stats in a specified interval.
• Enhanced Memory Warnings - The plugin provides the Memory Warning Level triggered by the Android OS. So your code can act accordingly.


Click the 'View documentation' link above for more information.
